cards.title: Friday
powers: {Friday} deals 1 target 2 melee or projectile damage or 3 damage of a type that has been dealt since the end of your last turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: Once before the start of your next turn, when a target deals damage, it may deal 1 damage of the same type to the same target.
One player may put the top card of their trash into play if that card is an ongoing or one-shot. If they do, discard the top card of that deck.
One hero may use a power.

openingLines.default: [Threat detected... Analyzing strengths and weaknesses... Calibrating...]
openingLines.VainFacadePlaytest.GrandfatherCharacter: You've meddled in the timeline enough.
openingLines.TheDreamerCharacter: Objectives unclear: Why do we need the girl?

cards.title: Adaptive Endoskeleton
body: [y=0.999]Increase lightning damage dealt to {Friday} by 1.[/y]
When {Friday} would be dealt damage by a source other than {Friday}, you may attune this card to that damage's type.
Each time {Friday} is dealt damage of a type this card is attuned to, reduce damage of that type dealt to {Friday} by 1 until this card is attuned to another type or this card leaves play.

flavorQuotes.text: Enough fisticuffs,{BR}boys. She can't adapt to [b]bullets[/b].

cards.title: Anything You Can Do...
body: [y=0.999]Increase lightning damage dealt to {Friday} by 1.[/y]
Play this card next to a character other than {Friday}. The first time each turn that character regains HP, {Friday} regains 1 hp.
The second time each turn...{BR}} a card is drawn from that character's deck, you may draw a card.{BR}} a card from that character's deck enters play, you may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: They're [b]all[/b] Friday!{BR}The receptionist, the janitor, your{BR}personal assistant... We have no{BR}payroll. We have no employees!

cards.title: Built for War
body: When {Friday} would be dealt 5 or more damage from a single source, you may reduce that damage by up to 3.
powers: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Mimicries are revealed. Put one into your hand or into play. Shuffle the remaining revealed cards into your deck. If a card entered play this way, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“Entire frame is a durable alloy.{BR}Weaker, malleable form for infiltration{BR}overtop. To compensate, battle armor stored{BR}in extra-dimensional space.”{BR} - Scavenger,{BR}Sphere: Grandfather Paradox #2

cards.title: Damsel in Distress
body: When the hero target with the lowest HP would be dealt damage by a target other than {Friday}, redirect that damage to {Friday}.
When {Friday} is dealt damage by a target other than herself, you may destroy this card. If you do, {Friday} deals the source of that damage 4 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Put down the weapons,{BR}or the secretary gets it.
For the last time, we don't have a{BR}secretary! {sigh} Friday, you're in.{BR}Do your thing.

cards.title: Doppelganger
body: Select a deck.
You may destroy a target with 4 or fewer hp from that deck.
Reveal the top 3 cards of that deck. You may play or discard one of the revealed cards. Replace the other cards in order.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“None of you will survive. She's{BR}already here. You just talked to her. If{BR}you give up the watch, I can protect you. If{BR}you don't, nothing can.”{BR} - Carnaval, Grim Tidings:{BR}Daddy's Little REAPER

cards.title: Dracimp R9-A3 Arm Cannon
body: When {Friday} would deal a type of damage that has been dealt by a source other than {Friday} since the end of your last turn, you may increase that damage by 1.
powers: Select a damage type, then repeat this text 3 times: {Friday} deals 1 target 1 damage of that type. Reduce damage dealt to that target by 1 this turn.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“Like the armor, it's folded in{BR}extra-dimensional space around the{BR}arm. It can generate any kind of{BR}energy it's been exposed to.”{BR} - Scavenger,{BR}Sphere: Grandfather Paradox #2

cards.title: Energy Replication
body: [y=0.999]Increase Lightning Damage dealt to {Friday} by 1.[/y]
Once per round, when another target deals damage, {Friday} may deal 1 target X damage of the same type, where X = the amount of damage dealt or 3, whichever is lower.

flavorQuotes.text: Friday, buy us some time.{BR}No fatalities.

cards.title: Grim Reflection
body: [y=0.99]Treat this card as having the game-text of each ongoing card with one of your cards under it, replacing the name of any other characters with {Friday} and treating 'you' as {Friday}'s player.[/y]
At the start of your turn, destroy one of your ongoing cards.
powers: Put any number of cards in your hand under ongoing cards from another deck. Draw a card or use a power.

cards.title: I Can Do Better
body: When {Friday} is dealt damage by a target other than herself, {Friday} may deal the source of that damage X plus 2 damage of the same type, where X = the amount of damage dealt to {Friday}. If {Friday} deals damage this way, destroy this card.
powers: Play a mimicry or draw 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: We know who{BR}you are... and we know what you are.
You'll pay for what you did to{BR}Geyser.

cards.title: Protean Doom
body: Play this card next to a target. Damage dealt to that target by {Friday} is irreducible and increased by 1.
powers: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand. Put the other revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.title: Prototype Combat Mimic
body: Once per round, at the end of another hero's turn, {Friday} may deal that hero 2 lightning damage.

When a hero other than {Friday} is dealt damage this way, {Friday} may use a power in that hero's play area, replacing the name of that hero on that card with {Friday} and with “You” on that card referring to {Friday}'s player.
cards.flavorText: {BR}<Am I connecting to you...{BR}or are you connecting to me?>{BR} - Node/Friday, All Smiles

cards.title: Ruthless Machine
body: When a card from another deck would cause {Friday} to deal herself damage, you may discard a card from your hand to prevent that damage.
powers: {Friday} deals 1 Target 2 melee or 2 projectile damage. Draw a card.

cards.title: T9-13 Exdim Reaper Armor
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Friday} by 1.
Once per turn when {Friday} deals damage, she may deal 1 damage of the same type to the same target.
At the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do not, {Friday} deals each target other than {Friday} 1 psychic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.90]She can do it, but don't{BR}be surprised if your men run from [b]her[/b].
[y=0.90]A risk I'm willing to take. Let's see{BR}what she's got. {click} Friday,{BR}release the kraken!

cards.title: Technological Duplication
body: [y=0.999]Increase lightning damage dealt to {Friday} by 1.[/y]

Play this card next to an equipment card from another deck without a copy of this card next to it. This card gains the text of that card. Treat the name of the hero on that card as {Friday}, and “you” on that card as {Friday}'s player.
When that card leaves play, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Do you want me to be?

cards.title: Unstable Circuitry
body: When this card enters your hand, put it into play.
{Friday} deals herself 1 irreducible lightning damage.
You may draw 2 cards. If you do, shuffle this card into your deck.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“He adopted the most{BR}dangerous, unstable weapon of{BR}Apocalypse 4 and raised it as a child.{BR}It was never a child. It's a weapon of{BR}mass destruction.”{BR} - Carnaval, Grim Tidings:{BR}Daddy's Little REAPER

cards.title: Vessel of Destruction
body: When this card is destroyed, {Friday} deals 1 target 1 irreducible fire damage or destroys 1 environment or ongoing card.
powers: Select a hero. Destroy any number of their ongoing or equipment cards. For each card destroyed this way, {Friday} deals 1 target 1 irreducible fire damage or destroys an ongoing or environment card. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: You win this round,{BR}dear. I'm positively flummoxed! What a{BR}mess! Will you be staying for dinner? I can{BR}whip up something for you and your hero{BR}friends.
